lesson.title: Adding starter code
lesson.description: Import Couchbase Lite headers and start writing

introduction.paragraph: To get started with the HelloWorld app code, you need to import Couchbase Lite packages and add a bit of initial code. After you have the initial code in place, you can build and run the app. By building the app at this stage of development you can make sure that Couchbase Lite for Android and other dependencies were set up correctly.
